Articles.Content:
I had to search long to find the right medical term

I had this surgery because I have a problem with a wisdom tooth, and now also began to erupt another wisdom tooth, bottom left.

After tomorrow I go to the hospital for tests on local anesthetics, I have a severe allergy, the dentist I want to know what kind of anesthesia can get.

How do I know the life I have to wait two weeks or even a month I for an appointment the dentist
Eat bread-enriched milk with cooked meat chunks in it, plus some leaves for good measure.
So what's exactly the question? Or you're just informing us about your oral condition?
